ygData.subject: Re: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve actually noticed a increase. I was dueling a warrior on my necro for the heck of it and in duels procs are a lot more rare we ll her obstenate claymore
ygData.messageBody:
I've actually noticed a increase. I was dueling a warrior on my necro for
the heck of it and in duels procs are a lot more rare we'll her obstenate
claymore proced like mado n me and my pet heh was interesting.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF <JasonF@...>
To: Eqbards@... <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, January 21, 2000 11:21 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Post Patch Procing


>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>
>I'm not too concerned yet, but did anyone else playing last night notice a
>staggering drop in the number of procs that their weapons are firing? I
was
>fighting Ogre Bouncers inside Oggok last night with my Ykesha and I believe
>the number of times it fired over the course of about 4 hours of play was
>either 2 or 3 - that's a very serious drop, perhaps an order of magnitude.
>The last hour or so I loaded up all of my DEX equipment and played Chant of
>Battle and had a DEX of 186 and didn't proc once. After killing Bouncers I
>ran over to Cazic-Thule and beat on some lizzies and gators for testing
>purposes (also 186 DEX) and got not a single proc while there (around 20
>solo kills).
>
>Crier Sharpsong
>
>
>
